examples: The explosion sent the car flying in the air
She sent her children to camp
He directed all his energies into his dissertation

definitions.text: to cause or order to be taken, directed, or transmitted to another place
examples: He had sent the dispatches downtown to the proper people and had slept

definitions.text: cause to be directed or transmitted to another place
examples: I'll mail you the paper when it's written
The spy sent the classified information off to Russia

definitions.text: cause to be admitted; of persons to an institution
examples: After the second episode, she had to be committed

definitions.text: broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television
examples: We cannot air this X-rated song
